subject: Mental Health
title: Freud and the Unconscious Mind
description: Learn Freud and the Unconscious Mind in one minute.

hook.text: Sigmund Freud claimed your deepest thoughts were hidden from you â€” even by you.

buildup.text: In the 1890s, Freud proposed the unconscious mind drives behavior through hidden desires.

discovery.text: Psychoanalysis used free association and dream analysis to uncover buried conflicts.

twist.text: Most of Freud's specific theories have been debunked by modern neuroscience.

climax.text: But his core idea â€” that unconscious processes shape behavior â€” remains influential.

punchline.text: Freud got the answer wrong but asked the right question.

quiz.question: What was Freud's central contribution to psychology?
options: The idea that unconscious processes shape behavior
